Workplace Definition: Physiological needs encompass providing basic necessities such as a fair wage, comfortable working conditions, access to breaks, and health-related benefits.

Leadership Support:

  • Competitive Compensation: Ensure employees receive competitive salaries and benefits packages.
  • Safe Workspace: Maintain a clean, safe, and conducive work environment.
  • Health and Wellness Programs: Offer programs promoting physical and mental well-being.

Monitor Achievement:

  • Employee Satisfaction Survey: Measure employees' satisfaction with their compensation and working conditions.
  • Health Metrics: Track employee health metrics, such as stress levels and absenteeism rates.
